DOC.brief_summary: Will intervention ( Heart SMART program ) feasible moderate high stress patient , refer Women 's Heart Preventive Cardiology clinic Mayo Clinic ?
DOC.brief_title: Stress Management Intervention Women 's Heart Clinic , Heart SMART Program
DOC.detailed_description: The Heart SMART Program design offer practical efficacious stress management resiliency intervention . It involve make participant aware practice enhance present moment awareness engagement . It teach learner train attention , refine interpretation ; utilizing principle gratitude , compassion , acceptance , high meaning forgiveness . Participants choose use one two delivery method ( either face face method on-line method ) Heart SMART program .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Women age 2575 year . 2 . Able speak English complete questionnaire . 3 . Selfreported Stress Scale 6 10 ( visual analog scale 1 10 1 low stress 10 high stress ) 4 . Women face face session able attend SMART session . 5 . Women online group require ability use internet access online training material . 1 . Selfreported Stress Index < 6 2 . Pregnant woman exclude participation study . Pregnancy test require intervention study pose risk 3 . Unable give write consent 4 . Inability refusal cooperate study procedure
